review.title: “Communication is necessary”
review.pros: Pros – Seeing patients who are so grateful and friendly.
review.cons: Cons – Too much of a social status climb and unfortunately office work is the bottom rung. Since receptionist sit for most of the time, our work can be under appreciated.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Be friendly but don't be a pushover. Defend your work in a professional manner if someone makes a derogatory claim.
